entities.name: krum
entities.description: Krum is introduced as the one asking questions to Barny Weasley. He is described as glowering over his drink while watching Xenophilius.

entities.name: barny weasley
entities.description: Barny Weasley is introduced as the son of Arthur and Molly Weasley. He is described as being asked questions by Krum.

entities.name: lovegood
entities.description: Lovegood is introduced as a man that Krum seems to have an issue with. He is described as wearing a sign on his chest.

entities.name: fleur
entities.description: Fleur is mentioned as the host of Lovegood. She is not physically present in the scene.

entities.name: xenophilius
entities.description: Xenophilius is introduced as a warlock who is chatting with several other warlocks on the dance floor.

relationships.description: Krum asks Barny Weasley questions about Lovegood.
Krum seems to have a strong dislike for Lovegood, as evidenced by his desire to duel him.
Krum is watching Xenophilius from across the dance floor.
Lovegood is a guest of Fleur's, according to Krum.
